modShortDescription: This mod lets users easily change menu artwork. To change the background, you simply replace the .png files in UIAtlases/ItemIconAtlas.
modDescription:
This mod lets users easily change menu artwork.

**Doughphunghus’s fork – updates:**

* To change the background, you simply replace the .png files in UIAtlases/ItemIconAtlas with those of the same size.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a19/tree/main/Khelldon-CustomMenu)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a18/tree/main/Khelldon-CustomMenu)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Khelldon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khelldon/), [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
